title: Video: NO – There's A Glow
body:
I’m a sucker for Grand Theft Auto 5, and I love LA outfit **NO**, so combining the two is only going to be great, right? Yeah, of course it is.

For their new video for _There’s A Glow_, **NO** go all Californication on us, drawing scenes of chaos from the hit game whilst following lead singer **Bradley Hanan Carter** around the streets of Los Santos (based on Los Angeles). There’s explosions, punch-ups and a startlingly lack of involvement from the police, before culminating in a typical video game twist, somehow fitting perfectly with the epic, fists to the sky anthemic feel of the track itself.
